path_title: Neha Kumar's Digital Skills Development Path
path_description: A personalized learning journey for Neha Kumar focusing on Digital Literacy, Data Entry, Communication Skills to build professional skills for remote work opportunities.

milestones.title: Digital Literacy Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learn the essential basics of Digital Literacy to build a solid foundation.
milestones.project: Create a basic Digital Literacy portfolio piece to demonstrate your skills

milestones.title: Advanced Digital Literacy
milestones.description: Build on your Digital Literacy knowledge with advanced techniques and practical applications.
milestones.project: Develop a comprehensive Digital Literacy project that showcases your advanced capabilities

milestones.title: Data Entry Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learn the essential basics of Data Entry to build a solid foundation.
milestones.project: Create a basic Data Entry portfolio piece to demonstrate your skills

milestones.title: Advanced Data Entry
milestones.description: Build on your Data Entry knowledge with advanced techniques and practical applications.
milestones.project: Develop a comprehensive Data Entry project that showcases your advanced capabilities

milestones.title: Communication Skills Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learn the essential basics of Communication Skills to build a solid foundation.
milestones.project: Create a basic Communication Skills portfolio piece to demonstrate your skills

milestones.title: Advanced Communication Skills
milestones.description: Build on your Communication Skills knowledge with advanced techniques and practical applications.
milestones.project: Develop a comprehensive Communication Skills project that showcases your advanced capabilities

career_opportunities.title: Remote Data Entry Professional
career_opportunities.description: Work with organizations to manage and process data remotely.

career_opportunities.title: Digital Assistant
career_opportunities.description: Provide administrative and technical support for businesses online.

career_opportunities.title: Content Creator
career_opportunities.description: Create digital content for websites, social media, and other platforms.
